item.title: Database & ACID properties
item.description: What is Database? : A database is a collection of data that is stored in an organized manner. the term “database” is often used casually to refer to both a database and the DBMS used to manipulate it. Database Models : A database model refers to the logical structure, representation or layout of a database and how the data will be stored, managed and processed within it.
